thread.section_title: MemoryC.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MemoryC.com | www.memoryc.com
thread.title: Liz mccarthy

author: Liz mccarthy
title: Liz mccarthy
text: I ordered a memory card by phone told rep what kind of camera i had she informed me this chip would fit this particular sony camera. I finally received and it was not correct I want to return it but i have to pay for shipping then I'm told i need to return it within 10 days with a certain form i had to download via e-mail. Now i have to send that form to my granddaughter so she can return the chip. To crazy for a 15 cents postage stamp item. Im hoping memory C will contact me so i can get a full refund
